testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (navigation menu, buttons, image gallery)
Check for proper navigation structure with links to Explore, Featured, Login/Signup
Verify application shows real image showcase functionality, not just placeholder text
Confirm responsive design elements are present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional image showcase features with navigation, gallery display, and interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test complete user registration and login functionality
steps: Navigate to /auth page
Verify login/signup toggle functionality works
Test user registration with valid email, username, and password
Verify successful registration redirects to authenticated state
Test logout functionality
Test login with registered credentials
Verify authentication state persists across page refreshes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully register, login, logout, and maintain authentication state
testCases.failureCondition: Authentication fails, errors occur, or state is not maintained

testCases.name: Image Gallery Display Test
testCases.description: Test that image gallery displays properly on homepage
steps: Navigate to homepage
Verify image gallery grid layout is present
Check that images load and display correctly
Verify image titles and descriptions are shown
Test 'View Image' links functionality
Check responsive grid behavior on different screen sizes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Image gallery displays in organized grid with proper metadata and functional links
testCases.failureCondition: Gallery fails to load, images don't display, or layout is broken

testCases.name: Image Upload Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test image upload feature for authenticated users
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to /upload page
Verify upload form is present with file input, title, description, and tags fields
Test file selection functionality
Fill in required metadata fields
Submit upload form
Verify success message appears
Check that uploaded image appears in gallery
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authenticated users can successfully upload images with metadata
testCases.failureCondition: Upload fails, form validation errors, or images don't appear in gallery

testCases.name: Navigation Menu Test
testCases.description: Test navigation menu functionality and authentication-aware display
steps: Verify top navigation bar is present and fixed
Test logo link redirects to homepage
Check Explore and Featured links work correctly
For unauthenticated users: verify Login/Signup links are present
For authenticated users: verify Upload, Notifications, and user dropdown are present
Test user dropdown menu functionality (Profile, Dashboard, Logout)
Verify navigation is responsive on mobile devices
testCases.expectedOutcome: Navigation menu displays correctly based on authentication state and all links function properly
testCases.failureCondition: Navigation links broken, authentication state not reflected, or mobile responsiveness fails

testCases.name: Search and Discovery Test
testCases.description: Test image search and discovery features
steps: Navigate to /explore page
Verify search interface is present
Test search functionality with various keywords
Verify search results display correctly
Test category filtering if available
Check pagination or infinite scroll functionality
Verify 'Featured' section displays curated content
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works correctly and returns relevant results with proper display
testCases.failureCondition: Search fails, no results displayed, or filtering doesn't work

testCases.name: User Profile Management Test
testCases.description: Test user profile viewing and dashboard functionality
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to user dashboard via dropdown menu
Verify dashboard displays user's uploaded images
Test profile viewing by clicking on username or profile link
Verify profile page displays user information correctly
Check that user's image gallery is displayed on profile
Test viewing other users' profiles
testCases.expectedOutcome: User profiles display correctly with uploaded images and user information
testCases.failureCondition: Profile pages fail to load, user data missing, or images not displayed

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test application on desktop resolution (1920x1080)
Test on tablet resolution (768x1024)
Test on mobile resolution (375x667)
Verify navigation menu adapts to smaller screens
Check image gallery grid adjusts column count appropriately
Verify forms and buttons remain usable on mobile
Test touch interactions on mobile devices
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays and functions correctly across all screen sizes
testCases.failureCondition: Layout breaks, elements overlap, or functionality is lost on smaller screens

testCases.name: Error Handling and Validation Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and form validation
steps: Test login with invalid credentials
Test registration with duplicate email
Test image upload without required fields
Test image upload with invalid file types
Verify appropriate error messages are displayed
Test network error scenarios (if possible)
Check that errors don't crash the application
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback
testCases.failureCondition: Application crashes, no error messages shown, or errors are unclear

testCases.name: Social Features Test
testCases.description: Test social interaction features like likes, comments, and follows
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to an image detail page
Test like functionality if available
Test comment functionality if available
Test follow/unfollow functionality on user profiles
Verify notifications are generated for social interactions
Check notifications page displays recent activity
testCases.expectedOutcome: Social features work correctly and generate appropriate notifications
testCases.failureCondition: Social features fail to work or notifications are not generated

testCases.name: Basic Performance Test
testCases.description: Test basic application performance and loading times
steps: Measure initial page load time
Test image loading performance in gallery
Verify smooth scrolling and navigation transitions
Check for memory leaks during extended use
Test application performance with multiple images loaded
Verify lazy loading of images if implemented
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs smoothly during normal use
testCases.failureCondition: Slow loading times, janky animations, or performance degradation

testCases.name: Content Quality and Professional Appearance Test
testCases.description: Verify application has professional appearance and meaningful content
steps: Check overall visual design and layout quality
Verify proper typography and color scheme
Check for consistent styling across all pages
Verify all text content is meaningful and professional
Check for proper image aspect ratios and quality
Verify loading states and empty states are handled well
Check for accessibility features (alt text, keyboard navigation)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates professional design quality with polished user experience
testCases.failureCondition: Poor visual design, inconsistent styling, or unprofessional appearance
